$EIGEN published details about Season 2 TLDR; - 70m $EIGEN or 4.2% of total supply will be distributed - Snapshot was taken Aug 15th - Claim will be on Sep 17th - Direct Stakers will claim on Eigenlayer portal - $eETH, $rswETH etc. holders will claim via restaking operators
Eigen Foundation: 1/ We’re excited to announce the EIGEN Season 2 Stakedrop in preparation for unlock! Season 2 will recognize key contributors and participants across the ecosystem: ☑️ Stakers & Operators ☑️ Ecosystem Partners ☑️ Community Claims go live on or before September 17, 2024. More…
